page.title: 15MEDIA
page.content: There are two newsagents in the village which are owned by the same company. Only one shop has a delivery service employing{13}young people who deliver to{600}houses. Between the two shops they sell{5845} daily papers per week and{1168}Sunday papers. These are printed in{London} and transported by road from a depot in{Chelmsford}. A local newspaper, 'The Maldon and Burnham Standard' is printed in Maldon.{997}copies are sold in Southminster. Besides being{newsagents}both shops sell{general stationary goods, sweets, {tobacco}and{soft drinks.}
